mapper.insert: insert into user(userName, userEmail, userPwd, userBirth, userGender, userPhoneNumber) values (#{userName},#{userEmail},#{userPwd},#{userBirth},#{userGender},#{userPhoneNumber})
mapper.select: update user set userPwd = #{userNewPwd} where userEmail = #{userEmail} and userPwd = #{userPwd}
select count(*) from user where userEmail = #{userEmail} and userPwd = #{userPwd}
select * from user where sessionKey = #{value} and sessionLimit > now()
